resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158188</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158188</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2369</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A simulation of human influence on the global climate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation des menschlichen Einflusses auf 
das globale Klima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation d'influence humaine sur le climat 
global</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação da influência humana no clima 
global</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione di influenza umana sul clima 
globale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση της ανθρώπινης επιρροής στο παγκόσμιο 
κλίμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación de la influencia humana en el 
clima global</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simulation which allows the user to feed in various parameters which influence the global climate, and to receive a graphic output of the expected changes until the year 2100</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">population</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">environmental science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">global changes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">global climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation, die dem Benutzer erlaubt, 
verschiedene Parameter innen einzuziehen, die das globale Klima 
beeinflussen und eine graphische Ausgabe der erwarteten Änderungen 
bis das Jahr 2100 empfangen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation qui permet à l'utilisateur de 
charger les divers paramètres qui influencent le climat global, et 
pour recevoir un résultat graphique des changements prévus jusqu'à 
l'année 2100</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação que permita que o usuário 
alimente dentro os vários parâmetros que influenciam o clima global,
e para receber uma saída gráfica das mudanças previstas até o ano 
2100</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione che permette che l'utente carichi 
i vari parametri che influenzano il clima globale e ricevere un'uscita
grafica dei cambiamenti previsti fino all'anno 2100</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να 
ταϊ'σει στις διάφορες παραμέτρους που επηρεάζουν το παγκόσμιο 
κλίμα, και για να λάβει μια γραφική έξοδο των αναμενόμενων 
αλλαγών μέχρι το έτος 2100</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación que permite que el utilizador 
alimente adentro los varios parámetros que influencian el clima 
global, y recibir una salida gráfica de los cambios previstos hasta 
el año 2100</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bevölkerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimawissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">globale Änderungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">globales Klima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">population</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science environnementale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changements globaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">climat global</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">população</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudanças globais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">clima global</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">popolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienza ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamenti globali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">clima globale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πληθυσμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιβαλλοντική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σφαιρικές αλλαγές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παγκόσμιο κλίμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">población</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciencia ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cambios globales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">clima global</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
